Posts.Content: Suzanne24 wrote: I had my lumpectomy and sentinel node biopsy yesterday.  So far I feel ok.  I haven't been doing much, just sitting around most of the day, and took a nap.  I haven't taken the bandage off that is wrapped around my entire chest to take a look.  Can anyone tell me how they felt in the days after their operation, and how much they did?  I am enjoying my husband bringing me things and taking care of me! Thanks Dx 8/2011, DCIS, 2cm, Stage 0, Grade 3, 0/2 nodes, ER+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Surgery yesterday.... Suzanne24 Ginger48
